items.name: Starbucks - Main Campus
items.details: Located in the Student Union, 1st floor.

items.name: Starbucks - Hospital Entrance
items.details: Inside the hospital main lobby, near the gift shop.

items.name: Dunkin' - North Dorms
items.details: Drive-thru location near North Residence Halls.

items.name: Peet's Coffee - Med School Annex
items.details: Quiet cafe on the ground floor of the Medical Annex.

items.name: Peet's Coffee - Research Park
items.details: Located in the Research Park food court.

items.name: Jittery Joe's - Student Center
items.details: Popular local spot with outdoor seating.

items.name: Jittery Joe's - South Gate
items.details: Closest location to the South Campus entrance.

items.name: Blue Bottle Coffee - West Side
items.details: Gourmet coffee shop 15 mins away by bus.

items.name: Blue Bottle Coffee - Central Square
items.details: Premium quality in the main city square.
